data.name: pattern_EditedCommentForMessage
data.value:
h1.Komentar editovan za diskusiju:: "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/Projects/Messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" je izmjenio komentar diskusije: "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/Projects/Messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
$AdditionalData
"Pročitaj više":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/Projects/Messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID#comment_$CommentID"
^Dobili ste ovaj email jer ste registrirani korisnik "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portala. Da biste promjenili tip obavještavanja, molim Vas promjenite svoja "podešavanja pretplate":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_EditedCommentForTask
data.value:
h1.Komentar uređen za zadatak:"$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/Projects/Tasks.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" je uredio komentar za "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/Projects/Tasks.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID" zadatak:
$AdditionalData
"Pročitajte više":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/Projects/Tasks.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID#comment_$CommentID"
^Dobili ste ovaj email jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Ako ne želite primati obavjesti o ovom zadatku, molimo da se "odjavite":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/Projects/Tasks.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID".^

data.name: pattern_EditMessage
data.value:
h1.Discussion izmijenjeno: "$ {EntityTitle}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
$ __ DateTime "$ __ AuthorName": "$ __ AuthorUrl" je uredio raspravu: "$ {EntityTitle}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID" ":
$ AdditionalData.get_item ( "MessagePreview")
#foreach ($ fileInfo u $ AdditionalData.get_item ("Datoteke"). Tipke)
#beforeall
----------------------------------------
#svaki
"$ FileInfo": "$ AdditionalData.get_item (" Datoteke "). Get_item ($ fileInfo)"
#kraj
"Pročitajte više": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^

data.name: pattern_MessageDeleted
data.value:
h1.Discussion izbrisano: "$ EntityTitle"
$ __ DateTime "$ __ AuthorName": "$ __ AuthorUrl" je izbrisao raspravu "$ EntityTitle" u projektu "$ ProjectTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID".
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^

data.name: pattern_MilestoneClosed
data.value:
h1.Milestone zatvoreno: "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#status=closed"
$ __ DateTime "$ __ AuthorName": "$ __ AuthorUrl" je zatvorio "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#status=closed" prekretnica u "$ ProjectTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID" projekt.
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^

data.name: pattern_MilestoneCreated
data.value:
h1.Milestone stvoren: "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
$ __ DateTime "$ __ AuthorName": "$ __ AuthorUrl" je dodao novu prekretnicu: "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#sortBy=create_on&sortOrder=descending" $ ProjectTitle ":" projekt $ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID ".
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^

data.name: pattern_MilestoneDeadline
data.value:
h1. Obavijest o datumu dospijeća minestona: "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#my=true"
Ostalo je manje od 48 sati do datuma "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#my=true" prekretnica u "$ ProjectTitle": "$ $ {__VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID "projekt.
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^

data.name: pattern_MilestoneDeleted
data.value:
h1.Milestone izbrisan: "$ EntityTitle"
$ __ DateTime "$ __ AuthorName": "$ __ AuthorUrl" je izbrisao prekretnicu "$ EntityTitle" u projektu "$ ProjectTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID":
$ AdditionalData
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^

data.name: pattern_MilestoneEdited
data.value:
h1.Milestone uređeno: "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#my=true"
$ __ DateTime "$ __ AuthorName": "$ __ AuthorUrl" je uredio "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#my=true" prekretnica u "$ ProjectTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID" projekt.
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^

data.name: pattern_MilestoneResumed
data.value:
h1.Milestone nastavljeno: "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID"
$ __ DateTime "$ __ AuthorName": "$ __ AuthorUrl" je nastavio prekretnicu "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID" u "$ ProjectTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath } /Products/Projects/Projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID "projekt:
$ AdditionalData
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^

data.name: pattern_ResponsibleForMilestone
data.value:
h1.Milestone dodijeljen vama: "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#my=true"
$ __ DateTime "$ __ AuthorName": "$ __ AuthorUrl" vas je imenovao odgovornim za prekretnicu: "$ EntityTitle": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Milestones.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID#my=true" u " $ ProjectTitle ":" projekt $ {__ VirtualRootPath} /Products/Projects/Projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID ".
^ Primili ste ovu poruku e-pošte jer ste registrirani korisnik portala "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}": "$ {__ VirtualRootPath}". Da biste promijenili vrstu obavijesti, upravljajte svojim "postavkama pretplate": "$ RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL". ^
